title: 3 Accounts PERM BANNED
body: Okay first of all, the reasons I get banned is for toxicity they claim b/c i respond back to people being REAL nasty with me and sometimes you just can't take it and you respond back with their own medicine with a few words. Then you report them and somehow you get reported also and YOU ARE THE ONE WHO GETS BANNED! Even though YOU weren't the one being toxic! This is pathetic, you guys are giving out perm bans to people whos trying to really play the game and ignore these folks but the moment we respond back to someone being a jerk to us WE GET BANNED..doesn't matter if i spent $10 or $1000 on my account, I get banned for the stupidest stuff. I literally just got my account back from a 14 day suspension, I PLAYED 1 GAME!!! 1 GAME! And the shaco/temo that was on my team was talking trash bc he got ganked when I was mid trying to clear a wave. He said I didn't know how to play Yasuo etc and just being real negative. And I responded to him using minimum foul language, I said like two curse words the whole game but I still get banned after reporting him and teemo. I just had enough of this community, RIOT you ruin the experience too when the player is the one being a victim but someone we still get banned. Such a joke, it's time to boycott. I never got banned from any game due to this claim of "toxicity" for responding back to nasty people...

replies.body: Provide actual evidences to your claims. Not sob story, playing appeal to sympathy.

I think this is all a load of BS (the player rants on the forums, not the punishments).

I was perma banned back on the NA server (before OCE existed), and have never been banned since.

If you take the bait, you get what you deserve.

Just mute and report, don't respond.
It's just that easy.

**1st.** Show us proof that these other people who were more toxic than you, haven't **_also_** received warnings or punishments.

**2nd.** Theres no need to respond to nasty people, it's an online computer game, why are you so desperate for validation from random kids online? If they're a dick, let them embarrass themselves and ignore it, who the fuck cares what _'MumbangerXXX'_ or _'xDigBickx'_ thinks of you?

**3rd.** Maybe if you're looking for the sympathy vote, don't lead with _"I've had 3 accounts banned already"_, that's not exactly the best character witness. _"Im sorry your honour, I've murdered 3 people in the past, but this time I didn't mean it I swear!"_
If you have had that many accounts banned, it's pretty safe to say that it isn't the system's fault..  Maybe it's time to stop shifting the blame, and take a closer look at your own behaviour?

If you don't learn after the first time, you'll never learn.

It is called recidivism, and recidivists never get sympathy, only condemnation.

Agreed. Even just responding back without any foul words, even if it goes on and on throughout the game, back and forth, we're the ones that get banned though were not the ones that started the whole damn toxic rants.

Not spending a dime on this game.

Exactly! Don't ban the inters. Don't ban the trolls. Don't ban the people who threaten to kill you or are super toxic.

No, instead ban the victims.
